summary: SummaryL’Oreal Paris' Iconic Telescopic® Original Washable Mascara delivers extreme length and ultimate definition for up to 70 percent longer lashes and up to 24 HR wear. The specially designed Precision Brush catches every lash for instant separation.
details: DetailsBenefitsIntense lengthening mascara for up to 60% longer lashesOphthalmologist-tested & allergy-testedSuitable for sensitive eyes & contact lens wearersFragrance-freeFeaturesSmooth formula applies easily & smoothlyFlexible Precision elastomer brush visibly lengthens lashes up to 60%The comb side of the brush precisely separates lashes for a clump-free resultItem 2138215How To UseTo safeguard L'Oreal purity, reserve this product for your personal use. Treat the applicator with the hygienic care you give your eyes. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle. Do not dilute mascara with water, saliva, or any other substance. Cap tightly after use. If change in odor or appearance occurs, discontinue use. Do not use this or any other eye cosmetic if your eye is injured, irritated, or infected. Consult a physician promptly.IngredientsWater Aqua, Paraffin, Beeswax Cera Alba, Stearic Acid, Carnauba/Carnauba Wax, Acacia/Acacia Senegal, Palmitic Acid, Triethanolamine, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Aminomethyl Propanediol, PEG-40 Stearate, Sodium Polymethacrylate, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Hydrogenated Jojoba Oil, Hydrogenated Palm Oil, Simethicone, BHT, Polyquaternium-10, Panthenol, Iron Oxides CI 77492, Iron Oxides CI 77499, Iron Oxides CI 77491, Ultramarines CI 77007, Chromium Oxide Greens CI 77288, Chromium Hydroxide Green CI 77289, Mica, Titanium Dioxide CI 77891, Carmine CI 75470, Ferric Ferrocyanide CI 77510.
how_to_use: To safeguard L'Oreal purity, reserve this product for your personal use. Treat the applicator with the hygienic care you give your eyes. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle. Do not dilute mascara with water, saliva, or any other substance. Cap tightly after use. If change in odor or appearance occurs, discontinue use. Do not use this or any other eye cosmetic if your eye is injured, irritated, or infected. Consult a physician promptly.
